20101229003202.000|20101229003204.000|TR0|United States in violation of federal law. 
20101229003204.000|20101229003207.000|TR0| But yet we induce you.  We provide an 
20101229003207.000|20101229003209.000|TR0|incentive.  We reward you for breaking the 
20101229003209.000|20101229003212.000|TR0|law.  It was never intended to be use that 
20101229003212.000|20101229003214.000|TR0|way.  It is a matter of moral law.  We

20101229003216.000|20101229003219.000|TR0|They wait in line.  You can't break into 
20101229003219.000|20101229003221.000|TR0|the country and then expect to be 
20101229003221.000|20101229003223.000|TR0|rewarded.  It's immoral.  It's illegal.  
20101229003223.000|20101229003226.000|TR0|It was never the intent.  All I'm trying 
20101229003226.000|20101229003228.000|TR0|to do is return the original intent of the 
20101229003228.000|20101229003230.000|TR0|14th Amendment.  That's what our founders 
20101229003230.000|20101229003233.000|TR0|-- that's what they decided.  That was 
20101229003233.000|20101229003235.000|TR0|what the debate made clear.  And that is 
20101229003235.000|20101229003237.000|TR0|the appropriate thing to do.

20101229003240.000|20101229003242.000|TR0|YELLIN:  Of course --
